title: Why do I lose interest so easily? - Quora

response.answer_text: Have you been checked by a doctor for ADD attention deficit disorder? If a person can’t keep their attention for long on anything it might appear they lose interest in things too easily. Another loss of interest can be a sign of depression so you may want to be checked for that as well. Another thing that affects ones attention is too much sugar in the diet My husbands daughter from a previous marriage was going to a Montessori school back east. As parents viewing the class rooms in session, they were surprised to find second graders busily focused on their work, without even one daydreaming or acting up or doing something else. The staff told them they would have to agree to give their child no sugar at all. That was the policy and that was why the kids were so focused and didn’t lose interest or attention at all. They said they would know if a kid got some sugar the night before because it affected them the next day at school. Yes, I said the next day, not just hours later. So if you go as sugar free as possible, that includes diet sugars, and you see improvement, great, if not, you really should see your doctor.

Comparison. People often lose interest and get bored of things very easily. The reason behind is that you compare your present situation with your past. You have to change your perspective to see your life and this world. Think differently… Now the question is how to think differently? Okay let imagine… Everyday you wake up, complete your daily chores ,go for your classes or work, come back exhausted and the day goes on as usual, its all same boring . Isn’t it?? Give it a second thought, is very day the same? No. Every moment is new just live it.. You see your face everyday in the mirror . Do you look the same everyday? Your answer will be NO. Someday you look sad ,someday you look cheerful. Someday vibrant and energetic and someday dull. Its our thinking that make us lose interest easily… Try watching a boring movie or serial and just think how can a person make such a useless thing and enjoy … Every moment is new and refreshing …just dont compare it with you past. Feel every moment of your life.
